abstract: Older teenage girls are far more likely to use social-networking sites like MySpace or Facebook, according to a recent study
snippet: Older teenage girls are far more likely to use social-networking sites like MySpace or Facebook, according to a recent study
lead_paragraph: Older teenage girls are far more likely than younger girls, or boys of any age, to use social-networking sites like MySpace or Facebook, according to a recent study by the Pew Internet & American Life Project.

headline.main: Boys and Girls Use Social Sites Differently
headline.print_headline: Boys and Girls Use Social Sites Differently
